original_title: Ghetto Physics: Will the Real Pimps and Hos Please Stand Up?
overview: Examines the interplay between Pimps and Hoâ€™s and how that dynamic is the simplest expression of how power is wielded in the world. The film utilizes documentary footage, animation, satire and dramatization to illustrate examples culled from the Hood to Wall Street - be the players real-life pimps or corporate executives repeating the same power dynamics.
title: Ghetto Physics: Will the Real Pimps and Hos Please Stand Up?
